short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leather Bitcoin Wallet - Your Bitcoin Wallet for DeFi, NFTs, Ordinals, and dApps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leather is a trusted self-custody Bitcoin Wallet designed to guide you to Bitcoin web3. Leather supports Bitcoin, Ordinals, Runes, BRC-20s, Stacks (STX), and Stacks NFTs in one place.  

Connect to hundreds of apps to swap tokens, mint NFTs, create inscriptions, and access DeFi.

With Leather, you can:

- Send, receive, and manage BTC with SegWit and Taproot addresses
- Swap and trade Ordinals, BRC20s, Stamps, and Stacks NFTs across top marketplaces 
- Manage STX and other Stacks based assets 
- Access decentralized identities like the Bitcoin Naming System (BNS) names
- Safely move your assets to cold storage with a Ledger 

Leather is 100% open-source and audited by top security firms. Be part of our community on X @LeatherBTC 

:warning: Beware of misleading Chrome store reviews offering phone support.
Leather only offers support via email. If you see similar reviews in the future, please report them to the Chrome store immediately.
